description: Mock Service Worker API mocking patterns

skills.name: Install MSW
skills.pattern: npm install msw --save-dev

skills.name: Init Worker
skills.pattern: npx msw init ./public --save

skills.name: REST Handler
skills.pattern: import { http, HttpResponse } from 'msw'; http.get('/api/users', () => HttpResponse.json([{ id: 1, name: 'John' }]))

skills.name: POST Handler
skills.pattern: http.post('/api/users', async ({ request }) => { const body = await request.json(); return HttpResponse.json(body, { status: 201 }) })

skills.name: Path Params
skills.pattern: http.get('/api/users/:id', ({ params }) => HttpResponse.json({ id: params.id, name: 'John' }))

skills.name: Query Params
skills.pattern: http.get('/api/users', ({ request }) => { const url = new URL(request.url); const page = url.searchParams.get('page') })

skills.name: Request Body
skills.pattern: http.post('/api/login', async ({ request }) => { const { email, password } = await request.json() })

skills.name: Request Headers
skills.pattern: http.get('/api/me', ({ request }) => { const auth = request.headers.get('Authorization') })

skills.name: JSON Response
skills.pattern: HttpResponse.json({ data: 'value' })

skills.name: Status Code
skills.pattern: HttpResponse.json({ error: 'Not found' }, { status: 404 })

skills.name: Response Headers
skills.pattern: HttpResponse.json(data, { headers: { 'X-Custom': 'value' } })

skills.name: Network Error
skills.pattern: http.get('/api/data', () => HttpResponse.error())

skills.name: Delay Response
skills.pattern: import { delay } from 'msw'; http.get('/api/slow', async () => { await delay(2000); return HttpResponse.json({}) })

skills.name: Setup Worker
skills.pattern: import { setupWorker } from 'msw/browser'; export const worker = setupWorker(...handlers)

skills.name: Start Worker
skills.pattern: if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development') { const { worker } = await import('./mocks/browser'); await worker.start() }

skills.name: Setup Server
skills.pattern: import { setupServer } from 'msw/node'; export const server = setupServer(...handlers)

skills.name: Test Setup
skills.pattern: beforeAll(() => server.listen()); afterEach(() => server.resetHandlers()); afterAll(() => server.close())

skills.name: Runtime Override
skills.pattern: server.use(http.get('/api/users', () => HttpResponse.json({ error: 'Server error' }, { status: 500 })))

skills.name: GraphQL Query
skills.pattern: import { graphql, HttpResponse } from 'msw'; graphql.query('GetUser', () => HttpResponse.json({ data: { user: { id: 1 } } }))

skills.name: GraphQL Mutation
skills.pattern: graphql.mutation('CreateUser', ({ variables }) => HttpResponse.json({ data: { createUser: { id: 1, ...variables } } }))

skills.name: GraphQL Variables
skills.pattern: graphql.query('GetUser', ({ variables }) => { const { id } = variables; return HttpResponse.json({ data: { user: { id } } }) })

skills.name: Passthrough
skills.pattern: http.get('/api/real', () => passthrough())

skills.name: Cookies
skills.pattern: http.get('/api/me', ({ cookies }) => { const session = cookies.sessionId })

skills.name: Set Cookies
skills.pattern: HttpResponse.json(data, { headers: { 'Set-Cookie': 'session=abc; Path=/' } })

skills.name: Streaming
skills.pattern: const stream = new ReadableStream({...}); return new HttpResponse(stream, { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'text/event-stream' } })

skills.name: Binary Response
skills.pattern: const buffer = await fs.readFile('image.png'); return new HttpResponse(buffer, { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'image/png' } })

skills.name: Unhandled Requests
skills.pattern: worker.start({ onUnhandledRequest: 'warn' | 'error' | 'bypass' })

skills.name: Debug Mode
skills.pattern: worker.start({ quiet: false }); server.listen({ onUnhandledRequest: 'warn' })

skills.name: Handler Sets
skills.pattern: export const errorHandlers = [http.get('/api/*', () => HttpResponse.json({}, { status: 500 }))]; server.use(...errorHandlers)

skills.name: With Playwright
skills.pattern: test.beforeEach(async ({ page }) => { await page.route('/api/*', route => route.fulfill({ json: mockData })) })
